mapper.select: /* DlvrAddrMapper.dlvrAddrCodeList */ SELECT SIDO_NM, SIGUNGU_NM, NVL(LAW_DONG_NM, LI_NM) AS LAW_DONG_NM, LAW_DONG_CD FROM (SELECT DISTINCT LAW_DONG_CD, SIDO_NM, SIGUNGU_NM, LAW_DONG_NM, LI_NM FROM TB_CM_POST WHERE SIDO_NM LIKE '%' || #{addrNm} || '%' OR SIGUNGU_NM LIKE '%' || #{addrNm} || '%' OR LAW_DONG_NM LIKE '%' || #{addrNm} || '%' OR LI_NM LIKE '%' || #{addrNm} || '%' AND USE_YN = 'Y') WHERE LAW_DONG_CD NOT IN (SELECT LAW_DONG_CD FROM TB_MS_MY_DLVR_ADDR WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd}) GROUP BY SIDO_NM, SIGUNGU_NM, LAW_DONG_NM, LI_NM, LAW_DONG_CD ORDER BY LAW_DONG_NM
mapper.insert: /* DlvrAddrMapper.addDlvrAddr */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_MY_DLVR_ADDR ( STORE_CD, MY_AREA_CD, SIDO_NM, SIGUNGU_NM, LAW_DONG_CD, LAW_DONG_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{myAreaCd}, #{sidoNm}, #{sigunguNm}, #{lawDongCd}, #{lawDongNm}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
